snippet.title: Aloft - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first official look at Aloft, an upcoming sandbox survival sim set in the clouds that's already got over 50,000 wishlists on Steam. You'll dodge hurricanes, craft your own sails, create your own island, and invite up to seven friends in eight-player co-op.

#Aloft
